rooms.description: Spacious living room with Vastu-compliant east-facing entrance.
Modern kitchen adjoining dining area; wheelchair accessible layout.
Open-plan dining space integrated with the living room for better flow.
Balcony attached to bedroom one; provides natural light and ventilation.
Balcony attached to bedroom two; designed for relaxation and garden view.
Dedicated swimming pool zone with wheelchair accessible access.
Main entrance hall that doubles as a circulation area and wheelchair-accessible reception.

openings.description: Main entrance with ramp for wheelchair accessibility; Vastu compliant direction.
Window connecting bedroom one and its balcony for enhanced light and ventilation.
Window connecting bedroom two and its balcony; designed with Vastu principles.
Doorway between kitchen and dining area for open-plan accessibility.
